page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: {LEISURE TIME} TWENTY THREE ELEVEN YEAR OLD PUPILS SET OUT TO DISCOVER HOW CHILDREN BETWEEN THE AGES OF FIVE AND ELEVEN YEARS SPEND THEIR LEISURE TIME -WHAT ACTIVITIES,INTERESTS & FACILITIES THEY HAVE. ALTOGETHER 1205 PUPILS IN 6 DIFFERENT SCHOOLS WITHIN OUR D BLOCK WERE QUESTIONED.WE FEEL THIS STUDY AND THE RESULTS ARE REPRESENTATIVE OF THE AREA AS A WHOLE AND TRULY REFLECT THE FACILITIES AVAILABLE,THE CULTURAL TASTES,THE PHYSICAL ENVIRONMENT AND THE CHILDREN THEMSELVES. HUMAN ERROR MUST BE CONSIDERED DUE TO THE AGE OF THE INTERVIEWEES AND INTERVIEWERS.
